data.title: Which national parks are open in Thailand? – Discovery Dmc Blog
data.text:
Updated 29 Dec 2021

THAILAND NATIONAL PARKS UPDATE

Why this is important? Many of Thailand’s most spectacular highlights are in designated national park or reserve areas.

Thailand closed many of its 155 national parks, waterfalls and even island archipelagos for covid prevention. These have been gradually opened and here is a list of all national parks that are open at the moment. Be prepared to wear a mask, temperature checks and show your vaccine certificate upon entry. Note that when going into public parks in Thailand like Lumpini (main park in Bangkok) same rules apply.
